Senior Software Engineer

Company: TechCorp Inc
Location: San Francisco, CA (Remote)
Salary: $120,000 - $180,000 per year

About the Role:
We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our growing engineering team. You will work on cutting-edge web applications using modern technologies.

Responsibilities:
- Design and develop scalable web applications using React and TypeScript
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams including product managers and designers
- Mentor junior engineers and conduct code reviews
- Participate in agile development processes and sprint planning
- Write clean, maintainable, and well-tested code

Requirements:
- 5+ years of experience in software development
- Strong proficiency in TypeScript, React, and Node.js
- Experience with AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes
- Solid understanding of RESTful APIs and microservices architecture
- Excellent problem-solving and communication skills
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

Qualifications:
- Experience with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices
- Knowledge of SQL and NoSQL databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
- Familiarity with testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library)
- Strong leadership and stakeholder management skills
- Agile/Scrum experience

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and equity
- Health, dental, and vision insurance
- 401(k) matching
- Flexible work arrangements
- Professional development budget
- Generous PTO
